name: P2P Web File Transfer
description: P2P Web File Transfer using WebRTC, wrapped in PeerJS

scripts.dev:
echo "Starting server..." && node server.js & echo "Compiling assets...
" && node-sass -w --include-path scss scss/index.scss public/css/style.css
scripts.prod:
echo "Compiling assets...
" && node-sass --include-path scss scss/index.scss public/css/style.css --output-style compressed && echo "Starting Server...
" && node server.js

author: klingebot
